Package pxchat.net.protocol.core

Interface Summary
FrameAdapterListener This interface contains the callbacks used by the FrameAdapter.
ServerFrameAdapterListener This interface contains the callbacks used by the ServerFrameAdapter.
 

Class Summary
AuthFrameAdapter This class extends the frame adapter so that it is possible to store the authentication state of the adapter.
FrameAdapter This class represents the interface between a socket and the frame protocol.
FrameQueue This class stores Frame objects in a list.
ServerFrameAdapter This class represents the interface between a server socket and the frame protocol.
